question: 保持
sourceMnemonic:
When you <kanji>preserve</kanji> the things you <kanji>hold</kanji> on to, you're <vocabulary>keep</vocabulary>ing them. In other words, you're <vocabulary>hold</vocabulary>ing and <vocabulary>maintain</vocabulary>ing them!

Note that <ja>保持</ja> is a formal word that's commonly used in professional or official contexts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
